reviewText: OK so first and foremost what I liked about these two videos was that  the girls were very real girl-next-door kinda type, but their adventures are very much real+ funny and overall unscripted, meaning these girls were in the moment without even knowing sometimes there was a camera on them at all times. Both dvds feature beautiful girls flashing their private parts to unsuspected strangers and flashing out of cars in real heavy congested traffic in downtown Los Angeles. So if you're looking for plenty of T&A then this is the way to go. Also the first thing that made me wanna buy this dvd set was the price at $5 dollars you cant go wrong and highly reccomend it if you are into reality tv girls going wild and naked for the camera. I don't think I ever saw them actually wear any clothing of any type. And one last thing I forgot to mention in the scavenger hunt series is it features a porn star by the name ZANA, man she is one hot blonde who isn't afraid to show her junk in public, she is wild and man i wish i knew more girls like her. This starlet alone is worth your time and money for this dvd playboy set.

With the Playboy Exposed series, the production values are not as high as the usual Playboy stuff, yet I often find the Exposed DVDs sexier to watch because of the realism. To me, the usual Playboy DVDs are often very stylized to the point of annoyance. I like these 2 in the Exposed series, although the camerawork and editing are pretty erratic, especially on the Erotic Scavenger Hunt. But WOW, there's LOTS of sexy ladies on both of these! Both run roughly an hour and both are in 1.33:1 picture ratio. The Naughty Girls one shows the girls getting ready for and going to parties in L.A., and ends with a lengthy segment of several girls in a hot tub that's quite sexy. The Scavenger Hunt show has 3 girls doing a scavenger hunt around L.A. (I guess), often getting topless or naked in the process. There's some public flashing here since they often pull up their shirts in stores, out on the street, flashing passing cars, and so on. After a hard day's work of hunting, they go to someone's backyard (wish it had been mine) and strip naked to play with water hoses. One of these girls is really stacked, and all of them are hot for sure! By the way, it's different girls on the 2 shows here, and as for what we see, topless is the most common but there's a good deal of complete nudity on these as well. As far as I know, none of the girls is well known, but I've seen some of them around on shows like these. But as I said, don't expect great production values here - sometimes the wobbly camera is pretty irritating. Despite that, I watch both of these shows pretty often, and I recommend most of the Playboy Exposed series for some good dirty fun.
